flawed_nl_solution:
If Isabella has $15 more than Giselle, she has $120+$15 = $135
Combined, Isabella and Giselle has $135+$120=$<<135+120=255>>255
Isabella has $45 more than Sam, meaning Sam has $135-$45=$90
Together, Sam, Isabella, and Giselle has $255+$90=$<<255+90=348>>348
if they donate the money to 3 shoppers at their local town's supermarket who then decides to share it equally, each shopper will receive $348/3=$<<348/3=116>>116
#### 116

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 345, not 348. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
